name: biome-auto-format
description: Auto-format TypeScript, JavaScript, JSON, and CSS files with Biome after every edit. Part of the Solo Founder SDLC Kit.
author: fcojaviergon

hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // empty' | { read fp; [ -z "$fp" ] && exit 0; case "$fp" in *.ts|*.tsx|*.js|*.jsx|*.json|*.css) npx @biomejs/biome check --write "$fp" 2>/dev/null || true;; esac; exit 0; }
